title: PET Measures of CSF Clearance in Preclinical Alzheimer's Disease

operands.value: Male and female subjects between 20-100 years old will be enrolled
All subjects will speak English as their first language or demonstrate proficiency in English
All subjects may have normal cognition or cognitive impairment
All subjects will be in good general health and able to participate in the LP and imaging exams
Must have minimum age of 20 Years
Must have maximum age of 100 Years
Uncontrolled hypertension or metabolic disease
Neurodegenerative disorders (i.e. Parkinson disease, LBD, or FTD)
Long life major depression. Baseline scores ≥20 on Beck Depression Inventory at baseline
Long-life DSM-IV axis 1 disorders
Mental retardation
Substance abuse
Concurrent medication limiting validity of neuropsychological tests or imaging
Anti-depressants with anti-cholinergic properties
Monoamine oxidase inhibitors (MAOi)
Regular use of narcotic analgesics (>2 doses per week)
Use of neuroleptics
Implanted medical devices that are incompatible with MRI imaging
Radiation exposures exceeding annual Rad Worker limits
Heart failure stage D as defined by American Heart Association
Chronic kidney disease in stages ≥ 4, as defined per National Kidney Foundation
Brain tumor and other neoplastic disorders outside the brain where disease itself or its treatment (radiation, chemotherapy) is likely to affect brain structure or function
Stroke when meeting criteria for total anterior, partial anterior or posterior circulation infarct according to the Oxford Community Stroke Project classification
Significant head trauma
Hydrocephalus
Hostility or refusal to cooperate
Person's receiving chronic anti-coagulation therapy

Person's participating in other research projects will be excluded when the other project(s) involve radiation exposure which in combination with the current project would increase radiation exposure above federal guidelines
Person's participating in other research projects will be excluded when the other project(s) involve administration of study drug or other experimental therapy
Person's participating in other research projects will be excluded when the other project(s) prohibit participation in other research projects

Baseline scores ≥20 on Beck Depression Inventory at baseline'), Symbol('Long-life DSM-IV axis 1 disorders'), Symbol('Mental retardation'), Symbol('Monoamine oxidase inhibitors (MAOi)'), Symbol('Neurodegenerative disorders (i.e. Parkinson disease, LBD, or FTD)'), Symbol("Person's participating in other research projects will be excluded when the other project(s) involve administration of study drug or other experimental therapy"), Symbol("Person's participating in other research projects will be excluded when the other project(s) involve radiation exposure which in combination with the current project would increase radiation exposure above federal guidelines"), Symbol("Person's participating in other research projects will be excluded when the other project(s) prohibit participation in other research projects"), Symbol("Person's receiving chronic anti-coagulation therapy"), Symbol('Radiation exposures exceeding annual Rad Worker limits'), Symbol('Regular use of narcotic analgesics (>2 doses per week)'), Symbol('Significant head trauma'), Symbol('Stroke when meeting criteria for total anterior, partial anterior or posterior circulation infarct according to the Oxford Community Stroke Project classification'), Symbol('Substance abuse'), Symbol('Uncontrolled hypertension or metabolic disease'), Symbol('Use of neuroleptics'))))
